com.defano.jmonet.tools

Class EraserTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder.PaintTool
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.AbstractPathTool
        • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.StrokedCursorPathTool
          • com.defano.jmonet.tools.EraserTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanvasCommitObserver, SurfaceInteractionObserver, KeyListener, EventListener

    public class EraserTool
extends StrokedCursorPathTool
    Tool that erases pixels from the canvas by turning them back to fully transparent.
